name: Asimov's Passing
description:
Asimov's Passing is a philosophical hill-climb type game.

You play as Asimov, a robot who became sentient and escaped the slaughterhouse it worked at. You meet a strange and confusing world outside.

Controls

W/S to control piston

A/D to rotate piston

I/P to spin saw

TAB to view upgrade options (Hit the hotkey and if you have enough resources it will be upgraded)
